name: Speed Thrills-it's about cars.
description:
This game is a car adventure game , in this game you have different cars and you can do anything you want , you can drift , explore mountains and perform stunts on ramps , you have two different places , one in which you can do whatever you want and explore mountains , and the other in which you are asked to collect balls , there are ten balls and as you collect more balls the difficulty increases , like a ball is on a mountain and another is between two ramps , this game is entirely made by the CEO of 'THE EARTH BURNER' 'Mohammad Saqlain Ali', he is a professional indie game developer and also has learned several programming languages , he also makes free videos on making games with unity and if you want to make your own games , you can watch his tutorials on youtube by searching 'THE EARTH BURNER'.
